title: Is there a modern alternative to the smartphone for listening to music? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes there are several alternatives to listening to music other than a smartphone. You have the iPod touch that is a great device not just for music listing but other things too. Then you have several still MP3 players out there to choose from. There are some MP3 players that microSD cards and others that have internal memory. You have Android wear and the Apple Watch both will hold music files for listening to when you're on the run and about your day. Yes there are several ways to listen too tour music without using a smartphone.

Yes. The best way to listen to music is to go to a performance and hear it live. the next best way is to hear it on high quality headphones and after that, hearing it on a good state-of-the art sound system. Hearing music on device speakers is not a way to hear music as it is meant to be heard.
